org.crosswire.jsword.bridge
类 BookExporter

java.lang.Object
  org.crosswire.jsword.bridge.BookExporter

public class BookExporter
extends java.lang.Object

Exports the Book in SWORD's imp format. This is identical to SWORD's mod2imp. Note: it does not work with GenBook.

作者：
DM Smith [dmsmith555 at yahoo dot com]
另请参见：
for license details.
The copyright to this program is held by it's authors.

方法详细信息

mod2imp

public void mod2imp()
             throws BookException
抛出：
BookException

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Call with <operation> book. Where operation can be one of:
  • check - returns "TRUE" or "FALSE" indicating whether the index exists or not
  • create - (re)create the index
  • delete - delete the index if it exists
And book is the initials of a book, e.g. KJV.

参数：
args -

usage

public static void usage()
